articles.content: In May of 2020, with the COVID-19 pandemic fully underway, Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerbergannounced that the company would allow most of its employees to continue working from home until at least the en… [+3049 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: FDA approves first COVID-19 test kit for home use - Fox Business
articles.description: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration said on Tuesday it had approved the first COVID-19 self-testing kit for home use that provides results within 30 minutes.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - The U.S. Food and Drug Administration said on Tuesday it had approved the first COVID-19 self-testing kit for home use that provides results within 30 minutes.
